languages.text: "Без него Касбаллика получила пространство для маневра, начала... переговоры с текущей властью. В сложившемся хаосе Миссия может предложить корабли, связи и ресурсы, оправдывающие более терпимое отношение к ней со стороны династии Чорда".

"Without him around, the Kasballica found some room for manoeuvre and began... negotiating with the new authorities. In the current chaos, the Mission is able to offer ships, connections, and resources that justify a more tolerant disposition from House Chorda."
languages.original_text: "Без него Касбаллика получила пространство для маневра, начала... переговоры с текущей властью. В сложившемся хаосе Миссия может предложить корабли, связи и ресурсы, оправдывающие более терпимое отношение к ней со стороны династии Чорда".

languages.text: 「彼がいなかったら、カスバリカはなんらか策謀の余地を見出して…新しい権威との交渉を始めたことでしょう。現在の混乱の中なら、チョーダ家から寛大な処遇を受けていたことの弁明のためにも、聖務団は船やコネクション、資源を提供できるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Without him around, the Kasballica found some room for manoeuvre and began... negotiating with the new authorities. In the current chaos, the Mission is able to offer ships, connections, and resources that justify a more tolerant disposition from House Chorda."

traits.locale_text: 「彼がいなかったら、カスバリカはなんらか策謀の余地を見出して…新しい権威との交渉を始めたことでしょう。現在の混乱の中なら、チョーダ家から寛大な処遇を受けていたことの弁明のためにも、聖務団は船やコネクション、資源を提供できるでしょう」

languages.text: « Sans lui, la Kasballica a désormais une plus grande marge de manœuvre pour enfin... négocier avec les nouvelles autorités. Avec le chaos qui règne, la Mission peut proposer des vaisseaux, des contacts et des ressources, ce qui justifie une plus grande tolérance de la part de la maison Chorda. »
languages.original_text: "Without him around, the Kasballica found some room for manoeuvre and began... negotiating with the new authorities. In the current chaos, the Mission is able to offer ships, connections, and resources that justify a more tolerant disposition from House Chorda."

traits.locale_text: « Sans lui, la Kasballica a désormais une plus grande marge de manœuvre pour enfin... négocier avec les nouvelles autorités. Avec le chaos qui règne, la Mission peut proposer des vaisseaux, des contacts et des ressources, ce qui justifie une plus grande tolérance de la part de la maison Chorda. »

languages.text: “他失踪之后，卡斯巴利卡集团找到了斡旋的余地，开始……与新的当局谈判。在当前的混乱局面下，卡斯巴利卡可以提供舰船、人脉和资源，以此换得库尔达宽容的态度。”
languages.original_text: "Without him around, the Kasballica found some room for manoeuvre and began... negotiating with the new authorities. In the current chaos, the Mission is able to offer ships, connections, and resources that justify a more tolerant disposition from House Chorda."

traits.locale_text: “他失踪之后，卡斯巴利卡集团找到了斡旋的余地，开始……与新的当局谈判。在当前的混乱局面下，卡斯巴利卡可以提供舰船、人脉和资源，以此换得库尔达宽容的态度。”

languages.text: "Ohne ihn erhielt die Kasballica etwas Spielraum und ... trat in Verhandlungen mit den neuen Autoritäten ein. In dem derzeitigen Chaos kann die Mission Schiffe, Verbindungen und Ressourcen bereitstellen, die eine tolerantere Haltung des Hauses Chorda rechtfertigen."
languages.original_text: "Without him around, the Kasballica found some room for manoeuvre and began... negotiating with the new authorities. In the current chaos, the Mission is able to offer ships, connections, and resources that justify a more tolerant disposition from House Chorda."

traits.locale_text: "Ohne ihn erhielt die Kasballica etwas Spielraum und ... trat in Verhandlungen mit den neuen Autoritäten ein. In dem derzeitigen Chaos kann die Mission Schiffe, Verbindungen und Ressourcen bereitstellen, die eine tolerantere Haltung des Hauses Chorda rechtfertigen."

languages.text: «Sin él, la Kasballica vio una oportunidad de actuar y empezó... a negociar con las nuevas autoridades. Con el caos que estamos viviendo, la misión puede conseguir naves, conexiones y recursos, y eso propiciará que la casa Chorda adopte una actitud más tolerante».
languages.original_text: "Without him around, the Kasballica found some room for manoeuvre and began... negotiating with the new authorities. In the current chaos, the Mission is able to offer ships, connections, and resources that justify a more tolerant disposition from House Chorda."

traits.locale_text: «Sin él, la Kasballica vio una oportunidad de actuar y empezó... a negociar con las nuevas autoridades. Con el caos que estamos viviendo, la misión puede conseguir naves, conexiones y recursos, y eso propiciará que la casa Chorda adopte una actitud más tolerante».

languages.text: "O resimden çıkınca Kasballica da harekete geçmeye fırsat buldu ve... Yeni yetkililerle pazarlığa başladı. Chorda Hanesi; şu an ortam karışıkken Misyon'un sunduğu gemi, bağlantı ve kaynaklar sayesinde daha hoşgörülü olma eğiliminde."
languages.original_text: "Without him around, the Kasballica found some room for manoeuvre and began... negotiating with the new authorities. In the current chaos, the Mission is able to offer ships, connections, and resources that justify a more tolerant disposition from House Chorda."

traits.locale_text: "O etrafta olmayınca Kasballica harekete geçmek için fırsat buldu ve yeni yetkililerle pazarlık yapmaya başladı. Chorda Hanesi, şu an ortam karışıkken Misyon'un sunduğu gemiler, bağlantılar ve kaynaklar sayesinde daha hoşgörülü olma eğiliminde."
